title: Tom Nichols: Our Own Worst Enemy
itunes:title: Tom Nichols: Our Own Worst Enemy
description: Tom Nichols, Professor of National Security Affairs, US Naval War College, columnist for USA Today, and contributing writer at The Atlantic, discusses his new book, Our Own Worst Enemy: The Assault from within on Modern Democracy, and how a decline in civic virtue has generated a dangerous illiberalism.
